p: An IL with the same cation but with [DCA] âˆ’ (DCA = dicyanamide) anion was used in a hybrid electrolyte containing a redox additive, improving the specific capacitance of N-doped reduced graphene aerogel capacitors [ 68]. The electrochemical reduction mechanism of NbF 5 and NbCl 5 in the ionic liquid 1-butyl-1-methylpyrrolidinium trifluoromethanesulfonate, [bmpy][OTf], was also reported very recently [ 69].
